body_html: If the number of bins fit into the shared memory of the GPU (48kb / 4bytes ~ 12,000 bins max) then you might be able to write a faster version of unsorted_segment_sum that does atomics in shared memory and then to global memory. I think right now everything goes straight to global memory.
